Aggregate statistics for delayed_job with delayed_job_stats

I’ve recently found myself frustrated at the lack of immediate visibility with delayed_job. After hunting around online for an existing solution, I bit the bullet and created a plugin called delayed_job_stats to provide me with some useful statistics about delayed_job via Rake and Capistrano:

    Jobs remaining: 803
    Jobs run:       0
    Jobs failed:    0
    Workers:        1

Take a look at the README at the project’s GitHub repository for instructions.
